 var textarea = document.createElement('textarea');
 document.body.appendChild(textarea);
 textarea.parentNode.removeChild(textarea);

 * KE.create(id) - create editor
 * KE.remove(id) - remove editor
 * KE.show(id) - show editor
 * KE.hide(id) - hide editor
 * KE.design(id) - change to design mode
 * KE.source(id) - change to source mode
 * KE.save(id, element) - save html to textarea
 * KE.html(id, html) - get/set html
 * KE.text(id, text) - get/set text
 * KE.selectedHtml(id, html) - get/set selected range
 * KE.selectedText(id, text) - get/set selected range
 * KE.readonly(id, bool) - readonly

{{{
var editor = KE({
    srcElement : KC.query('textarea#content1'),
});
editor.create();
editor.remove();
KE.create(editor);
KE.create(editor.id);
